splash.title: How DiversiTea Works
splash.text:
Each month DiversiTea selects two different teas, pack them into our environmental friendly package and deliver them directly to your doorstep. In order to enroll, please answer the tea quiz below. 
If you would like to just purchase individual tea, please check our Tea Dictionary.

intro: For someone with particular taste, DiversiTea is on a mission to transform every customers' tea brewing experience by devising a data-driven tea recommendation system.
title: Find the perfect tea you would love

block.heading: Exquisite taste
block.paragraph: Enjoy the finest quality loose leaf teas, freshly sourced from the best tea experts in the UK

block.heading: Seasonality
block.paragraph: Glow your tea musings by focusing on different aspects of nature and the changing seasons in the box

block.heading: Bio-degradable
block.paragraph: As much as we think of tea, we think of the environmental sustainability of our product
